statements: SELECT * FROM distances
SELECT id, point1_latitude, point1_longitude FROM distances
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE point1_latitude > 40
SELECT id, point1_latitude, point1_longitude FROM distances WHERE point1_latitude < 30
SELECT id, point1_latitude, point1_longitude, point2_latitude, point2_longitude FROM distances
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE id = 1
SELECT point1_latitude, point1_longitude FROM distances WHERE point2_latitude > 40 AND point2_longitude < -70
SELECT id, point1_latitude, point2_latitude FROM distances WHERE point1_longitude = -80 ORDER BY point2_latitude DESC
SELECT MAX(point1_longitude), MIN(point1_longitude) FROM distances WHERE id > 3
SELECT id, point2_latitude FROM distances WHERE point1_latitude < 30 AND point2_longitude BETWEEN -90 AND -80
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM distances WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT location1_id, location2_id, distance FROM distances ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT l1.location_id, l1.latitude, l1.longitude, d.distance FROM locations l1 INNER JOIN distances d ON l1.location_id = d.location1_id WHERE d.distance > 50;

SELECT l1.location_id as location1, l2.location_id as location2, d.distance FROM distances d INNER JOIN locations l1 ON d.location1_id = l1.location_id INNER JOIN locations l2 ON d.location2_id = l2.location_id WHERE l1.latitude > 40 AND l2.longitude < -90;
SELECT * FROM user;
SELECT id, username FROM user WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM location ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE id <> 1;
SELECT * FROM distance WHERE location1_id = 2 AND location2_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM location
SELECT * FROM user WHERE id=1
SELECT username, email FROM user ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT DISTINCT id, distance FROM distance WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT location1_id, location2_id, SUM(distance) AS total_distance FROM distance GROUP BY location1_id, location2_id
SELECT * FROM point_a WHERE id = 1;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM point_b WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, calculated_distance FROM distance WHERE id = 3;
SELECT city FROM geolocation WHERE id = 4;
SELECT * FROM point_a WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM point_a WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM point_b WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT id, city FROM geolocation ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT AVG(calculated_distance) AS avg_distance FROM distance;
SELECT id, city, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation WHERE city LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM points;
SELECT point_id, longitude, latitude FROM points WHERE latitude > 50;
SELECT start_point_id, end_point_id, distance FROM distances ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT calculation_name FROM calculations WHERE calculation_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM points WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY point_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT calculation_id, calculation_name FROM calculations WHERE calculation_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM distances JOIN points ON distances.start_point_id = points.point_id WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_date, description FROM logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
